mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( MEMBER_IDX, MEMBER_IMAGE, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME ) VALUES ( member_seq.NEXTVAL, #{member_image, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{member_id}, #{member_pw}, #{member_name}, #{member_nickname} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_IMAGE = #{member_image, jdbcType = VARCHAR}, MEMBER_PW = #{member_pw}, MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{member_nickname} WHERE MEMBER_IDX = #{member_idx}
